abstract: National Pension Service, South Korea’s state-run fund, is seeking to acquire a 23 percent stake in American pipeline operator Colonial Pipeline from Chevron, the fund said Monday.
snippet: National Pension Service, South Korea’s state-run fund, is seeking to acquire a 23 percent stake in American pipeline operator Colonial Pipeline from Chevron, the fund said Monday.
lead_paragraph: National Pension Service, South Korea’s state-run fund, is seeking to acquire a 23 percent stake in American pipeline operator Colonial Pipeline from Chevron, the fund said Monday according to Reuters.

headline.main: Korea’s National Pension Bidding for Colonial Pipeline
